name: Space Walk (Ayounis35)
description:
Modifications

---Design:

-Primary mechanic in one level is to escape chasers and attempt to make it to the top left of the map. The other level is destroying an organized horde with a slower fire rate, making shooting a more conscious action.

-Narrative yet vague messages to instill open-ended lore

---Gameplay:

-One level has many obstacles as you escape chasers. Incentive to move slow and calculated. The other level has minimal obstacles and many enemy projectiles to dodge.

---Aesthetic:

-Sprite is now an astronaut, rotating body positions as you move, Comical visual of someone hurdling through space

-Added black holes. 

-Menu updated and customized to show off new character,

 Background updated and varied in level transition to give a sense of location change
